title: Sins of the father and of the son
creator_contributor_role: National Film School (Great Britain), production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Interpersonal conflict
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Culture conflict
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Fathers and sons
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal conflict
description: Starring Jonathan Dockar-Drysdale, Hilary Hook, Camille Davies, Gigi Soames. Tells of a young man's journey to see his estranged father, a retired Army Colonel living on an island in the Indian Ocean where he studies Islamic culture. The strangeness of the culture and the surroundings lead to a break in the father and son's relationship.
